text:
────W-Weekend work
is at the station, right…?

Good...
I thought it was at the office────

…You probably didn't confirm,
but it's because it's the bullet train station.

<line-height=80%><size=80%>Inside the bullet train traveling at 200 kilometers per hour,
throwing at a speed of 50 kilometers per hour, the throwing
speed appears to be 250 kilometers per hour.
